products.short_desc: Kushi Women’s Rayon Maroon Kurti – Stylish Floral Printed Kurti with Buttons | Office & Daily Wear – Vastra by Rashi
products.long_desc:
Kushi Women’s Rayon Maroon Kurti – Stylish Floral Printed Kurti with Buttons | Office & Daily Wear – Vastra by Rashi

Unveil your personal style with the latest Kushi Kurti from Vastra by Rashi, where comfort meets culture. This stunning maroon rayon kurti features elegant off-white floral and stripe prints, a classic round neck, button-down detailing, and 3/4th sleeves — tailored for the modern woman who values tradition with a twist.

Perfect for daily wear, office, college, or small events, it drapes gracefully while offering breathable ease all day long. Match it with jeans, leggings, or palazzos for a chic ethnic look.

"Every Thread Speaks Your Story" — because you're not just wearing a kurti, you're wearing confidence.

products.name: Trackpro Premium Lycra Lower for Men | Stylish & Comfortable Sports Track Pants
products.short_desc: Kushi Women’s Rayon Maroon Kurti – Stylish Floral Printed Kurti with Buttons | Office & Daily Wear – Vastra by Rashi
products.long_desc:
Trackpro Premium Lycra Lower for Men | Stylish & Comfortable Sports Track Pants

  • Fabric: Lycra
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Net Quantity: 1

About the Product

Elevate your active and casual wear collection with the Trackpro Premium Lycra Lower. Crafted from a special blend of high-quality Lycra, these track pants are engineered to provide an excellent fit and feel. The stretchable fabric moves with your body, ensuring comfort at the gym, on a run, or while relaxing at home. Its lightweight and breathable nature keeps you cool and dry.

Style and Versatility

This lower is more than just athletic wear — it’s a style statement. With a sleek, modern design and slim-fit silhouette, it pairs effortlessly with t-shirts or hoodies. The elastic waistband with drawstring offers a customizable fit, and functional pockets provide added convenience.

Quality You Can Trust

From the trusted brand Trackpro, this lower represents quality and durability. Reinforced stitching and fade-resistant fabric make it a lasting staple in your activewear wardrobe.

products.name: Women's Fashion Kurti Cream - VastraByRashi
products.short_desc:
Women's Fashion Kurti – Liva Cream Multi-Print Rayon Kurti

by Vastra by Rashi

Every Thread Speaks Your Story

  • Fabric: Liva Rayon
  • Color: Cream base with Multicolor Ikat-style Print
  • Neckline: Round Neck
  • Sleeves: 3/4th Sleeves
  • Buttons: Front with Pink Buttons
  • Pattern: Dyed / Washed
  • Style: Straight Kurti
  • Occasion: Office Wear | Daily Wear | Festive Casuals
  • Wash Care: Machine/Hand Wash (Mild)
  • Country of Origin: India

Available Sizes:

  • L - Bust: 40 in, Length: 45 in
  • XL - Bust: 42 in, Length: 44 in

Grace your everyday look with this elegant cream-colored printed rayon kurti by Vastra by Rashi. Featuring traditional ikat-inspired multi-color prints in pink, blue, and black, it brings subtle charm and a splash of color to your wardrobe.

Made with premium Liva-certified rayon, this kurti is soft, breathable, and ideal for daily wear, office, or college. The round neckline, front-button detailing, and comfy sleeves give it a balanced blend of function and fashion.
